# coding:utf-8
"""
åŸºäºä½ æä¾›çš„Pythonä»£ç æ”¹å†™çš„n8nç‰ˆæœ¬
"""

import json
import datetime
import hashlib
import hmac

# è·å–è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®
input_data = items[0]['json']

# é…ç½®å‚æ•°
method = 'POST'
host = 'visual.volcengineapi.com'
region = input_data.get('region', 'cn-north-1')  # ä½ è¯´çš„åŒºåŸŸ
action = input_data.get('action', 'CVSync2AsyncSubmitTask')
version= input_data.get('version', '2022-08-31')
reqKey= input_data.get('reqKey', 'jimeng_ti2v_v30_pro')
endpoint = 'https://visual.volcengineapi.com'
service = 'cv'

# ä»è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®è·å–å‡­è¯
access_key = input_data.get('accessKeyId', 'your-ak')
secret_key = input_data.get('secretAccessKey', 'your-sk')
binary_data_base64 = input_data.get('binary_data_base64', '')
print(f"binary_data_base64 type: {type(binary_data_base64)}")
print(f"binary_data_base64 length: {len(str(binary_data_base64))}")

def sign(key, msg):
    return hmac.new(key, msg.encode('utf-8'), hashlib.sha256).digest()

def getSignatureKey(key, dateStamp, regionName, serviceName):
    kDate = sign(key.encode('utf-8'), dateStamp)
    kRegion = sign(kDate, regionName)
    kService = sign(kRegion, serviceName)
    kSigning = sign(kService, 'request')
    return kSigning

def formatQuery(parameters):
    request_parameters_init = ''
    for key in sorted(parameters):
        request_parameters_init += key + '=' + parameters[key] + '&'
    request_parameters = request_parameters_init[:-1]
    return request_parameters

def signV4Request(access_key, secret_key, service, req_query, req_body):
    if access_key is None or secret_key is None:
        return {'error': 'No access key is available.'}
    
    t = datetime.datetime.utcnow()
    current_date = t.strftime('%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ')
    datestamp = t.strftime('%Y%m%d')  # Date w/o time, used in credential scope
    
    print(f"=== åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯ ===")
    print(f"Current Date: {current_date}")
    print(f"Date Stamp: {datestamp}")
    print(f"Region: {region}")
    print(f"Service: {service}")
    print(f"Method: {method}")
    print(f"Host: {host}")
    print(f"Access Key: {access_key[:10]}...")  # åªæ˜¾ç¤ºå‰10ä½
    print()
    
    canonical_uri = '/'
    canonical_querystring = req_query
    signed_headers = 'content-type;host;x-content-sha256;x-date'
    payload_hash = hashlib.sha256(req_body.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest()
    content_type = 'application/json'
    
    print(f"=== è¯·æ±‚ä¿¡æ¯ ===")
    print(f"Query String: {canonical_querystring}")
    print(f"Body: {req_body}")
    print(f"Body Bytes Length: {len(req_body.encode('utf-8'))}")
    print(f"Payload Hash: {payload_hash}")
    print(f"Content Type: {content_type}")
    print()
    
    canonical_headers = 'content-type:' + content_type + '\n' + 'host:' + host + \
                       '\n' + 'x-content-sha256:' + payload_hash + \
                       '\n' + 'x-date:' + current_date + '\n'
    
    print(f"=== Canonical Headers ===")
    print(f"Signed Headers: {signed_headers}")
    print("Canonical Headers:")
    print(repr(canonical_headers))
    print()
    
    canonical_request = method + '\n' + canonical_uri + '\n' + canonical_querystring + \
                       '\n' + canonical_headers + '\n' + signed_headers + '\n' + payload_hash
    
    print("=== Canonical Request ===")
    print(repr(canonical_request))  # ä½¿ç”¨ repr æ˜¾ç¤ºè½¬ä¹‰å­—ç¬¦
    print()
    print("Canonical Request åŸæ–‡:")
    print(canonical_request)
    print()
    
    canonical_request_hash = hashlib.sha256(canonical_request.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest()
    print(f"=== Canonical Request Hash ===")
    print(canonical_request_hash)
    print()
    
    algorithm = 'HMAC-SHA256'
    credential_scope = datestamp + '/' + region + '/' + service + '/' + 'request'
    string_to_sign = algorithm + '\n' + current_date + '\n' + credential_scope + '\n' + canonical_request_hash
    
    print("=== String to Sign ===")
    print(f"Algorithm: {algorithm}")
    print(f"Current Date: {current_date}")
    print(f"Credential Scope: {credential_scope}")
    print(f"Canonical Request Hash: {canonical_request_hash}")
    print()
    print("String to Sign åŸæ–‡:")
    print(repr(string_to_sign))
    print()
    print(string_to_sign)
    print()
    
    # é€æ­¥æ˜¾ç¤ºç­¾åkeyç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹
    print("=== ç­¾åKeyç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹ ===")
    kDate = sign(secret_key.encode('utf-8'), datestamp)
    print(f"kDate (hex): {kDate.hex()}")
    
    kRegion = sign(kDate, region)
    print(f"kRegion (hex): {kRegion.hex()}")
    
    kService = sign(kRegion, service)
    print(f"kService (hex): {kService.hex()}")
    
    kSigning = sign(kService, 'request')
    print(f"kSigning (hex): {kSigning.hex()}")
    print()
    
    signature = hmac.new(kSigning, (string_to_sign).encode('utf-8'), hashlib.sha256).hexdigest()
    
    print(f"=== Final Signature ===")
    print(f"Signature Length: {len(signature)}")
    print(f"Signature: {signature}")
    print()
    
    authorization_header = algorithm + ' ' + 'Credential=' + access_key + '/' + \
                          credential_scope + ', ' + 'SignedHeaders=' + \
                          signed_headers + ', ' + 'Signature=' + signature
    
    print(f"=== Authorization Header ===")
    print(authorization_header)
    print()
    
    headers = {
        'X-Date': current_date,
        'Authorization': authorization_header,
        'X-Content-Sha256': payload_hash,
        'Content-Type': content_type
    }
    
    request_url = endpoint + '?' + canonical_querystring
    
    return {
        'headers': headers,
        'url': request_url,
        'body': req_body,
        'debug': {
            'canonical_request': canonical_request,
            'string_to_sign': string_to_sign,
            'signature': signature,
            'authorization': authorization_header,
            'payload_hash': payload_hash,
            'current_date': current_date,
            'credential_scope': credential_scope,
            'region': region,
            'service': service,
            'canonical_request_hash': canonical_request_hash
        }
    }

# è¯·æ±‚Queryï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä½ çš„éœ€æ±‚è°ƒæ•´
query_params = {
    'Action': action,  # ä½ ä¹‹å‰ç”¨çš„Action
    'Version': version,  # ä½ ä¹‹å‰ç”¨çš„Version
}
formatted_query = formatQuery(query_params)
if binary_data_base64:
    binary_data_base64 = str(binary_data_base64)
  
# è¯·æ±‚Bodyï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä½ æä¾›çš„æ­£ç¡®å‚æ•°
body_params = {
    "binary_data_base64": [binary_data_base64],
    "seed": -1,
    "prompt": input_data.get('prompt', 'your-ak'),
    "req_key": reqKey
}
# ç¡®ä¿JSONåºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸åŒ…å«é¢å¤–ç©ºæ ¼ï¼Œä¸åŸå§‹ä»£ç ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´
formatted_body = json.dumps(body_params, separators=(',', ':'), ensure_ascii=False)

# æ‰§è¡Œç­¾å
result = signV4Request(access_key, secret_key, service, formatted_query, formatted_body)

# è¿”å›ç»“æœç»™ n8n
return [{"json": result}]

# coding:utf-8
"""
åŸºäºä½ æä¾›çš„Pythonä»£ç æ”¹å†™çš„n8nç‰ˆæœ¬
"""

import json
import datetime
import hashlib
import hmac

try:
  # è·å–è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®
  input_data = _("å‡†å¤‡è§†é¢‘ç”Ÿæˆå‚æ•°").first().json
  # é…ç½®å‚æ•°
  method = 'POST'
  host = 'visual.volcengineapi.com'
  region = input_data.get('region', 'cn-beijing')  # ä½ è¯´çš„åŒºåŸŸ
  action = input_data.get('action', 'CVSync2AsyncSubmitTask')
  version= input_data.get('version', '2022-08-31')
  reqKey= input_data.get('reqKey', 'jimeng_ti2v_v30_pro')
  endpoint = 'https://visual.volcengineapi.com'
  service = 'cv'
  
  # ä»è¾“å…¥æ•°æ®è·å–å‡­è¯
  access_key = input_data.get('accessKeyId', 'your-ak')
  secret_key = input_data.get('secretAccessKey', 'your-sk')
  
  def sign(key, msg):
      return hmac.new(key, msg.encode('utf-8'), hashlib.sha256).digest()
  
  def getSignatureKey(key, dateStamp, regionName, serviceName):
      kDate = sign(key.encode('utf-8'), dateStamp)
      kRegion = sign(kDate, regionName)
      kService = sign(kRegion, serviceName)
      kSigning = sign(kService, 'request')
      return kSigning
  
  def formatQuery(parameters):
      request_parameters_init = ''
      for key in sorted(parameters):
          request_parameters_init += key + '=' + parameters[key] + '&'
      request_parameters = request_parameters_init[:-1]
      return request_parameters
  
  def signV4Request(access_key, secret_key, service, req_query, req_body):
      if access_key is None or secret_key is None:
          return {'error': 'No access key is available.'}
      
      t = datetime.datetime.utcnow()
      current_date = t.strftime('%Y%m%dT%H%M%SZ')
      datestamp = t.strftime('%Y%m%d')  # Date w/o time, used in credential scope
      
      print(f"=== åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯ ===")
      print(f"Current Date: {current_date}")
      print(f"Date Stamp: {datestamp}")
      print(f"Region: {region}")
      print(f"Service: {service}")
      print(f"Method: {method}")
      print(f"Host: {host}")
      print(f"Access Key: {access_key[:10]}...")  # åªæ˜¾ç¤ºå‰10ä½
      print()
      
      canonical_uri = '/'
      canonical_querystring = req_query
      signed_headers = 'content-type;host;x-content-sha256;x-date'
      payload_hash = hashlib.sha256(req_body.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest()
      content_type = 'application/json'
      
      print(f"=== è¯·æ±‚ä¿¡æ¯ ===")
      print(f"Query String: {canonical_querystring}")
      print(f"Body: {req_body}")
      print(f"Body Bytes Length: {len(req_body.encode('utf-8'))}")
      print(f"Payload Hash: {payload_hash}")
      print(f"Content Type: {content_type}")
      print()
      
      canonical_headers = 'content-type:' + content_type + '\n' + 'host:' + host + \
                         '\n' + 'x-content-sha256:' + payload_hash + \
                         '\n' + 'x-date:' + current_date + '\n'
      
      print(f"=== Canonical Headers ===")
      print(f"Signed Headers: {signed_headers}")
      print("Canonical Headers:")
      print(repr(canonical_headers))
      print()
      
      canonical_request = method + '\n' + canonical_uri + '\n' + canonical_querystring + \
                         '\n' + canonical_headers + '\n' + signed_headers + '\n' + payload_hash
      
      print("=== Canonical Request ===")
      print(repr(canonical_request))  # ä½¿ç”¨ repr æ˜¾ç¤ºè½¬ä¹‰å­—ç¬¦
      print()
      print("Canonical Request åŸæ–‡:")
      print(canonical_request)
      print()
      
      canonical_request_hash = hashlib.sha256(canonical_request.encode('utf-8')).hexdigest()
      print(f"=== Canonical Request Hash ===")
      print(canonical_request_hash)
      print()
      
      algorithm = 'HMAC-SHA256'
      credential_scope = datestamp + '/' + region + '/' + service + '/' + 'request'
      string_to_sign = algorithm + '\n' + current_date + '\n' + credential_scope + '\n' + canonical_request_hash
      
      print("=== String to Sign ===")
      print(f"Algorithm: {algorithm}")
      print(f"Current Date: {current_date}")
      print(f"Credential Scope: {credential_scope}")
      print(f"Canonical Request Hash: {canonical_request_hash}")
      print()
      print("String to Sign åŸæ–‡:")
      print(repr(string_to_sign))
      print()
      print(string_to_sign)
      print()
      
      # é€æ­¥æ˜¾ç¤ºç­¾åkeyç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹
      print("=== ç­¾åKeyç”Ÿæˆè¿‡ç¨‹ ===")
      kDate = sign(secret_key.encode('utf-8'), datestamp)
      print(f"kDate (hex): {kDate.hex()}")
      
      kRegion = sign(kDate, region)
      print(f"kRegion (hex): {kRegion.hex()}")
      
      kService = sign(kRegion, service)
      print(f"kService (hex): {kService.hex()}")
      
      kSigning = sign(kService, 'request')
      print(f"kSigning (hex): {kSigning.hex()}")
      print()
      
      signature = hmac.new(kSigning, (string_to_sign).encode('utf-8'), hashlib.sha256).hexdigest()
      
      print(f"=== Final Signature ===")
      print(f"Signature Length: {len(signature)}")
      print(f"Signature: {signature}")
      print()
      
      authorization_header = algorithm + ' ' + 'Credential=' + access_key + '/' + \
                            credential_scope + ', ' + 'SignedHeaders=' + \
                            signed_headers + ', ' + 'Signature=' + signature
      
      print(f"=== Authorization Header ===")
      print(authorization_header)
      print()
      
      headers = {
          'X-Date': current_date,
          'Authorization': authorization_header,
          'X-Content-Sha256': payload_hash,
          'Content-Type': content_type
      }
      
      request_url = endpoint + '?' + canonical_querystring
      
      return {
          'headers': headers,
          'url': request_url,
          'body': req_body,
          'debug': {
              'canonical_request': canonical_request,
              'string_to_sign': string_to_sign,
              'signature': signature,
              'authorization': authorization_header,
              'payload_hash': payload_hash,
              'current_date': current_date,
              'credential_scope': credential_scope,
              'region': region,
              'service': service,
              'canonical_request_hash': canonical_request_hash
          }
      }
  
  # è¯·æ±‚Queryï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä½ çš„éœ€æ±‚è°ƒæ•´
  query_params = {
      'Action': 'CVSync2AsyncGetResult',  # ä½ ä¹‹å‰ç”¨çš„Action
      'Version': version,  # ä½ ä¹‹å‰ç”¨çš„Version
  }
  formatted_query = formatQuery(query_params)
  
  task_id = _("æäº¤ç”Ÿè§†é¢‘ä»»åŠ¡").first().json.data.task_id
  # è¯·æ±‚Bodyï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä½ æä¾›çš„æ­£ç¡®å‚æ•°
  body_params = {
      "req_key": reqKey,
      "task_id": task_id
  }
  # ç¡®ä¿JSONåºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸åŒ…å«é¢å¤–ç©ºæ ¼ï¼Œä¸åŸå§‹ä»£ç ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´
  formatted_body = json.dumps(body_params, separators=(',', ':'), ensure_ascii=False)
  
  # æ‰§è¡Œç­¾å
  result = signV4Request(access_key, secret_key, service, formatted_query, formatted_body)
  
  # è¿”å›ç»“æœç»™ n8n
  return [{"json": result}]
except Exception as e:
    # Stop and Error
    raise Exception(f"æ•°æ®è·å–å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
